  Item 9.01.  Financial Statements and        
              Exhibits                        
                                              
Exhibits are filed herewith in connection with
the Registration Statement on Form S-3(File
No. 333-236148)filed by Wells Fargo & Company
with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
On June 2, 2020, Wells Fargo & Company issued
the following Medium-Term Notes, Series U: (i)
$3,250,000,000 Senior Redeemable Fixed-to-
FloatingRate Notes due June 2, 2028; and (ii)
$2,750,000,000 Senior Redeemable Fixed-to-
FloatingRate Notes due June 2, 2024
(collectively, the “Notes”). The purpose of
this Current Report is to file with the
Securities and Exchange Commission the form of
Note related to each issuance and the opinion
of Faegre Drinker Biddle & Reath LLP regarding
the Notes. (d) Exhibits
